_source.short_desc: Cloud based time clock solution that pre-populates reports for payroll. Employees can punch in on their desktop or mobile devices.
_source.long_desc: Punching in and out with our time clock software is intuitive for your employees and it's easy for managers to view and export time. Employees can clock in using a browser, iOS or Android app. View who's on the clock, including their GPS position. Advanced features such as PTO Accrual Tracking, Punch Rounding, Job Codes, QR Codes, Automatic Breaks, and SSO are all included in our cloud based time clock solution.
_source.pricing_details: Free trial on Any Plan.  Features include Job Codes, Locations, Managers, Notifications, OT Calculations, PTO/Sick/Vacation, Reports, Webcam photos on punches, iOS/Android Apps, Automatic Breaks, Single Sign On, GPS, IP Address Locks, Tablet/Mobile ready, Punch Rounding, QR Code support, & Integrations.
_source.target_audience: Our focus is on businesses from 1 to 1,000 employees.  We offer a simple and reliable time clock for employees with some great features including GPS, Integrations, Google SSO, job codes, and more!

related_products.short_desc: Schedule jobs, coordinate teams, track time and track projects, all in one place.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Time is a proud part of the QuickBooks family, seamlessly connecting with leading accounting tools like QuickBooks Online, ADP and more. Easily manage people, projects and payroll, all in one place

related_products.short_desc: Simply clock in and clock out using a timer, fill timesheets, track attendance, and use data for payroll and billing with Clockify.
related_products.features: Clockify is a time clock software that lets you track time spent on activities. You can create and edit time entries manually, track time by using a stopwatch, and generate personalized reports. Boost your time management skills with an integrated Pomodoro timer - customize it to work for your schedule. There is GPS clocking and location tracking available for remote field teams. Clockify monitors time from anywhere - web, desktop, mobile - all data is synced online.

related_products.short_desc: Leading cloud based time clock software for small and big teams. Easy to use, with great reports, multi-device and offline support.
related_products.features: Leading cloud-based time clock software for small and big teams. Simple, flexible tool for tracking work hours, with multi-platform support. Generates beautiful reports and time usage graphs with an option to export time logs as Excel spreadsheets, get weekly reports via email or share public reports links with clients to provide more transparency. Available as a web app, desktop apps for Windows and Mac, mobile apps for iOS and Android, and a browser extension for Chrome and Firefox.

related_products.short_desc: Time Tracking brings the award-winning BambooHR experience to time entry, approvals and reporting, on the web or the mobile app.
related_products.features: Time Tracking brings the award-winning BambooHR experience to time entry, approvals and reporting, on the web or the mobile app. It makes hours worked easy and accurate for employees to record, and simple and fast for their managers to review and approve. With features such as project tracking and geolocation, Time Tracking helps you maintain a productive and cost effective hourly workforce.

related_products.short_desc: ClockShark is the leading mobile time clock & GPS tracking software for local construction, field service, and contractors.
related_products.features: ClockShark is the leading mobile time clock and GPS tracking software built for construction, field service and contractors that want a simpler way to track employee time, run payroll quickly and accurately, and understand job costs. Over 7,000 customers have replaced the hassle of paper timesheets with software that makes it easier to run their business and keeps accountants happy.

related_products.short_desc: Rippling fully automates time tracking from check-in to paycheck. No manual entries, syncing issues or late approvals from supervisors.
related_products.features: With Rippling, employees can easily clock in and out using our mobile app, a tablet kiosk, or computer?and features like geolocation restrictions, QR codes, and selfie check-ins, help prevent buddy punching and off-site clock-ins. When employees clock-in, their approved hours instantly and accurately sync with your payroll system.

related_products.short_desc: See work happen in real-time with Hubstaff's time clock software and identify productivity trends. Start a free trial today!
related_products.features: Avoid inefficiency for time clock and work better with streamlined time tracking software from Hubstaff. Track time through simple desktop, web, and mobile apps, then manage invoicing, reporting, and more through one dashboard. Hubstaff integrates with over 30 apps so your business can run more efficiently, including Jira, Trello, Asana, Github, Slack, and Paypal. Available for Mac, Windows, Linux, and iOS.

related_products.short_desc: Flexible time clocks and mobile apps to fit Your business.
related_products.features: Start tracking time worked more accurately and efficiently with a range of Paychex time collection options. No matter what method you pick, rest assured that our systems fully integrate with Paychex Flex? Time, our intuitive, cloud-based time and attendance solution that supports businesses of all sizes and many types of working environments.

related_products.short_desc: The easy way to schedule, track time, attendance, and communicate with workers. Save time. Improve accountability. 14-day free trial.
related_products.features: When I Work is an easy way for businesses to schedule, track time and attendance, and communicate with their hourly employees. Put the schedule and time clock in every employee's pocket with free iOS and Android apps. Keep track of time off, employee availability, and manage shift swaps with just a few clicks. Integrate with your payroll provider to streamline the process and avoid human error. Get started with a 14-day free trial now.

related_products.short_desc: 7shifts is a robust scheduling, time tracking, and communication tool built specifically for restaurants. Start for free today!
related_products.features: 7shifts helps restaurants improve efficiency with intuitive scheduling, time tracking, communication, and compliance tools. The intuitive 7punches app integrates right into your schedule to manage time and attendance, reduce compliance risks, and improve employee accountability. The easy drag-and-drop schedule builder automatically factors in availability, time-off, overtime, and compliance, and managers can easily integrate their POS to ensure they hit their labor targets. Start free today!

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Attendance Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Attendance Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Attendance Tracking software helps organizations manage the whereabouts of their employees. These applications track an employee's vacation time off, sick time off, overtime, and absences. The software also searches for patterns in absences. Attendance Tracking software is related to Human Resource software, Payroll software, and Time Clock software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Scheduling software helps businesses organize and manage personnel's schedules. Employee Scheduling solutions often show work schedules of different employees side by side to allow managers to easily match tasks to people with the appropriate skill level. This software also allows employees to have real-time access to their and their colleagues' schedules, make changes to the system straight from the scheduling interface, and keep scheduling process up to date with the most current information. Employee Scheduling software is related to Appointment Scheduling software, Scheduling software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Human Resource software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Human Resource tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Human Resource software, also known as a Human Resources Information System (HRIS) or Human Resources Management System (HRMS), enables an organization to manage employee records and information. Human Resource Management software allows you to organize contact details, department, attendance, salary, training, benefits and more. Many Human Resource Management systems and resource management software also interface with applicant tracking and payroll software. Human Resource Management software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Payroll software, Performance Appraisal software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Leave Management systems on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Leave Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Leave Management System allows organizations to manage employee time-off, setup leave policies, and automate leave requests approval.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Payroll software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Payroll tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Payroll software automates the management of employees' salaries, wages, bonuses and deductions. Time off, vacation accrual, benefits and retirement accounts can also be tracked by a Payroll software system. These applications allow businesses to keep the payroll process in-house. Payroll software can be standalone, but often integrates with an organization's accounting software. Payroll software Human Resource software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Time Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Time Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Time Tracking software automates the tracking of billable hours. Time Tracking solutions can be used by organizations in professional services industries to monitor projects on a task and overall basis as well as billing rates so that the appropriate amount may be invoiced. Time Tracking software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Workforce Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Workforce Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Workforce Management software enables organizations to plan, track, and manage the allocation and requirements of labor resources. Workforce Management solutions also help organizations develop and retain top talent. These applications allow businesses to optimize staff scheduling, while reducing labor costs. Workforce Management software is related to Human Resource software, Payroll software, Scheduling software and Time Clock software.

_source.short_desc: Cloud based time clock solution that pre-populates reports for payroll. Employees can punch in on their desktop or mobile devices.
_source.long_desc: Punching in & out is intuitive for your employees & easy for you to view & export time.  Employees can clock in using a browser or our Google, iOS, & Android apps.  You can view who's working, their GPS position or even limit where they can punch.  We integrate with QuickBooks, ADP, Paychex, & SurePayroll while also offering Excel exports.  Advanced features such as PTO Accrual Tracking, Punch Rounding, Job Codes, QR Codes, Automatic Breaks, & SSO are all included in our cloud based time clock.
_source.pricing_details: Free trial on Any Plan.  Features include Job Codes, Locations, Managers, Notifications, OT Calculations, PTO/Sick/Vacation, Reports, Webcam photos on punches, iOS/Android Apps, Automatic Breaks, Single Sign On, GPS, IP Address Locks, Tablet/Mobile ready, Punch Rounding, QR Code support, & Integrations.
_source.target_audience: Our focus is on businesses from 1 to 1,000 employees.  We offer a simple and reliable time clock for employees with some great features including GPS, Integrations, Google SSO, job codes, and more!

related_products.short_desc: ADP Workforce Now is a human capital management solution for companies with more than 50 employees.
related_products.features:
The core capabilities of the solution are human resources management, payroll, benefits, talent management, compliance, time & labor management, analytics & benchmarking. 
The fully integrated suite is built on a single database, which automates data synchronization across different components and helps users to minimize manual administrative tasks. The platform also integrates with other HR and business applications via the ADP Marketplace and APIs.

related_products.short_desc: Workforce management is easier with Clockify - an app for tracking time and attendance, scheduling and organizing tasks and projects
related_products.features: Optimize productivity and reduce risks with Clockify - workforce management app. Track employee attendance, their work hours, compare tracked hours with daily targets. Clockify helps you track employee's availability and schedule tasks accordingly, let you visualize shifts to optimize workforce and avoid overlaps. With options to set billable hours, you can also measure profitability, control costs and make achievable plans.

related_products.short_desc: ClickUp is the world's leading workforce management tool with fully customizable and proprietary features that make it a must-have.
related_products.features:
ClickUp is one of the best-rated workforce management tools. Use Docs, Reminders, Goals, Calendars, Chat, scheduling, assigned comments, custom views, and more with this all-in-one workforce management tool!

Used by 100,000+ teams like Airbnb, Google, and Uber, it brings your entire workforce into a single tool. Built for teams of all sizes and industries, ClickUp?s fully customizable and proprietary features make it a must-have for anyone wanting to keep workforce management in one place.

related_products.short_desc: Confluence is a team workspace where knowledge and collaboration meet. Create, collaborate, and organize your work all in one place.
related_products.features: Confluence is a team workspace where knowledge and collaboration meet. It's a central source of truth for fast-moving companies. Confluence keeps everyone organized and aligned  with everything from meeting notes to strategy docs and IT documentation so they can make better decisions faster and be more responsive to change. Confluence integrates seamlessly with the Atlassian suite of products like Jira Software and Trello, and allows for endless customization with apps from our Marketplace.

related_products.short_desc: BambooHR automates operational manual HR processes and frees HR to perform the big-picture projects that make a difference.
related_products.features: With BambooHR's workforce management capabilities, you can create custom, self-service HR workflows to be more efficient in your decision-making processes as a company and protect the integrity of your data. Eliminate bottlenecks by streamlining your approval processes, paving the way for your company to grow faster.

Over 8,000 customers have replaced the hassle of paper timesheets with software that makes it easier to run their business and keeps accountants happy. You can also build powerful, custom reports that group labor costs by job, location, or any other dimension to visualize trends and inform strategic workforce planning.

Unify your service planning, process, and people on the
world's #1 CRM.
similar_products.features: Unify your service processes and people with workforce management and engagement software. Assign agents seamlessly with workforce management software. Predict case volumes, balance staffing and schedules, and engage agents in an integrated workspace. Build your service for speed and scale. Gain a complete view of your customer on one platform. Unify your CRM, digital channels, Service Cloud Voice, and now Workforce Engagement, all on Service Cloud.

similar_products.short_desc: Atlas spans all aspects of human experience management, so you can fast-track global ambition and simplify HR set-up.
similar_products.features: Atlas enables innovative companies to compete in a global economy, believing that businesses should employ whomever they want, wherever the talent exists. As the largest Direct Employer of Record (EOR), Atlas is a technology platform that is supported by experts and delivers flexibility for companies to expand across borders, onboard talent, manage compliance, and pay their global workforce without the need for a local entity or multiple third-party providers.

similar_products.short_desc: A modern workforce management platform built for rapidly scaling support teams.
similar_products.features: Assembled is a modern workforce management platform built for rapidly scaling global support teams. We help teams forecast support demand, build and manage team schedules, track real-time performance and schedule adherence, and uncover insights to improve support operations.

similar_products.short_desc:
Payroll and compliance built for the worldwide workforce.

Self-serve dashboards for contracts, payroll, equipment, and more.
similar_products.features:
Deel is global payroll and compliant hiring built for remote teams, where anyone, anywhere can get hired and paid. Instantly hire full-time employees or independent contractors across the world legally, in minutes. 

With Deel, companies hire, onboard, and pay their team with localized legal contracts in over 150 countries. Manage expense requests, IP protection, timesheets, and more.

Deel serves more than 4,500 customers, from SMBs to publicly traded companies like Shopify.

similar_products.short_desc:
Connect, engage, and empower your team. 

Let's make workforce management easy, so you can focus on caring for patients.
similar_products.features: Workforce management can be a daunting task - for long-term care facilities to national health systems and everywhere in between. ShiftWizard by HealthStream makes healthcare staff scheduling and communication easy, so leaders can focus on what really matters-caring for their patients. ShiftWizard's workforce management and scheduling solution was developed specifically for healthcare organizations. Simplify scheduling with a robust, easy-to-use guided navigation system.

similar_products.short_desc: Create more human experiences for all talent and unlock the skills and potential of your global workforce.
similar_products.features: Beamery's Talent Lifecycle Management platform allows enterprises to create more human experiences for all talent, and unlock the skills and potential of their global workforce. We help organizations identify and acquire top talent, move the needle on DE&I, close key skill gaps and retain top performers.

similar_products.short_desc: Verint Workforce Management provides the flexibility your employees demand to balance their work/life responsibilities.
similar_products.features: Verint Workforce Management is a tool that provides the flexibility your employees demand to balance their work responsibilities with the rest of their busy lives. And with the current job market, you will lose talented agents if you cannot accommodate these needs. Your contact center agents are the face and voice of your organization. But retaining and managing a high-quality staff is challenging. Today's contact center employees demand flexible schedules, meaningful work and telework options.

similar_products.short_desc: The easy way to schedule, track time, attendance, and communicate with workers. Save time. Improve accountability. 14-day free trial.
similar_products.features: When I Work is an easy way for businesses to schedule, track time and attendance, and communicate with their hourly employees. Put the schedule and time clock in every employee's pocket with free iOS and Android apps. Keep track of time off, employee availability, and manage shift swaps with just a few clicks. Integrate with your payroll provider to streamline the process and avoid human error. Get started with a 14-day free trial now.

similar_products.short_desc: High-level project and resource management software to help you make confident operational decisions across your people and projects.
similar_products.features: Resource Management by Smartsheet is a high-level project and resource management software helping teams make decisions about project planning, team capacity, budget forecasting, team utilization, and hiring needs in real time. Over 1,000 of the most innovative companies in the world rely on us from 10-person shops, to 100-person teams within global brands, to 1,000+ person professional services firms. We have been recognized for its design excellence with awards from FastCo, SXSW, IxDA + IDSA.

similar_products.short_desc: Indeavor's automated shift scheduling and labor analytics solution maximizes your most valuable asset-your employees.
similar_products.features:
Indeavor's solution offers complex organizations an automated, cloud-based shift scheduling, absence management, and labor analytics system for mid-large enterprises.

You'll always have the right person, in the right place, at the right time to increase efficiencies by staffing to match only what you need.

With the ability to either integrate with your critical enterprise systems (HCM, ERP, Payroll, etc.) or standalone, Indeavor will make you and your employees? everyday lives easier.

similar_products.short_desc: Papaya Global has the automated SaaS platform for today's world of work. Manage your global workforce with one platform.
similar_products.features: Papaya Global's automated SaaS platform is the perfect tool for managing your global workforce without any hassle. The platform integrates seamlessly with all HR software and consolidates your HR and payroll data from disparate solutions into one unified language. It lets you view and manage your entire global workforce on one payroll platform. Gain insights into your workforce with auto-generated BI reports based on your HR and payroll data.

similar_products.short_desc: Manage your services company better with Projectworks, the cloud-based workforce management platform. Sign up for a free trial today!
similar_products.features:
Designed for consulting, architecture, and engineering firms, Projectworks is a cloud-based workforce management platform. The unique feature set empowers you to become more profitable, and to operate more efficiently. 

Improved resource-booking, reduced bench time, maximized billable hours, and more accurate forecasts are just a few results Projectworks enables clients to see. Start saving time and money with Projectworks' free trial today!

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Applicant Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Applicant Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Applicant Tracking software allows organizations to easily manage the hiring process by maintaining a database of applicant and job information. Applicant Tracking solutions can be used by organizations to collect applicant information and then filter, grade and match candidates' skills against job requirements. Many Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) include an interface that allows recruiters to manage all of an organization's job openings. Applicant Tracking software is related to Human Resource software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Call Center software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Call Center tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Call Center software automates and standardizes the process of receiving and responding to customer phone calls. These solutions enable better monitoring of the customer experience, workflow management and evaluation of employee performance. Whether designed for virtual or site-based locations, Call Center applications manage and catalog the process of customer calls and often allow customers to track the progress of their request via the internet. Call Center software is related to Customer Service software and Help Desk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Human Resource software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Human Resource tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Human Resource software, also known as a Human Resources Information System (HRIS) or Human Resources Management System (HRMS), enables an organization to manage employee records and information. Human Resource Management software allows you to organize contact details, department, attendance, salary, training, benefits and more. Many Human Resource Management systems and resource management software also interface with applicant tracking and payroll software. Human Resource Management software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Payroll software, Performance Appraisal software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Payroll software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Payroll tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Payroll software automates the management of employees' salaries, wages, bonuses and deductions. Time off, vacation accrual, benefits and retirement accounts can also be tracked by a Payroll software system. These applications allow businesses to keep the payroll process in-house. Payroll software can be standalone, but often integrates with an organization's accounting software. Payroll software Human Resource software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Performance Appraisal tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Performance Management software automates the process of reviewing employee performance, setting new objectives, and writing individual development plans. A type of Performance Management solution is 360 degree feedback software, which manages the process in which an employee completes a self-evaluation and is also evaluated by their manager, peers, and direct reports. Performance Management software is related to 360 Degree Feedback software, Human Resource software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Talent Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Talent Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Talent Management software gives employers the tools to accurately manage, evaluate, and compensate based on employee performance. By tracking performance and standards, Talent Management software allows companies to create and maintain a high-performance workforce. Key features of this type of software include employee learning, compensation evaluations, policy compliance, and succession planning, all of which help companies manage personnel growth. Directories related to Talent Management software are Human Resource software, Performance Appraisal software, Succession Planning software, Training software, Workforce Management software, and Applicant Tracking software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Team Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Team Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Team Management software utilizes integrated communication capabilities and project/task management functionality to assist managers with improving collaboration, communication, and productivity within teams and team-related projects, whether remotely or in the office.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Time Clock software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Time Clock tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Time Clock software, also known as timesheet software, automates the tracking of employee attendance, scheduling, and vacations. Time Clock software gives organizations an overall picture of how employees spend their time as well as an analysis of labor costs on a per project basis. Time Clock software can be standalone, but often integrates with an organization's accounting software. Time Clock software is related to Human Resource software, Payroll software, and Workforce Management software.
